svg.text:
Randomization Debugging Checklist:
□ Sample Ratio Mismatch Test └─ Is observed ratio close to expected?
□ Covariate Balance └─ Are pre-treatment characteristics balanced?
□ Assignment Stability └─ Does same user always get same variant?
□ Time-Based Patterns └─ Any assignment differences by time of day/week?
□ Segment Analysis └─ Is ratio consistent across user segments?
□ Bot/Invalid Traffic └─ Are bots disproportionately in one group?
□ Technical Validation └─ Are there any code paths that bypass randomization?
□ Edge Cases └─ How are new users, logged-out users handled?
